page.mod_description:
Amber is a library api of common code utilized by iamkaf mods.

It is built on top of Architectury API and is available for Fabric and NeoForge.
page.mod_how_to_use: Just install it and the mods that require it will be good to go!
mod_credits: The Architectury Team for their amazing API.

page.mod_description: Mine an entire vein of ore, chop an entire tree or break any group of blocks by holding a hotkey. A veinmining mod for Fabric and NeoForge.
page.mod_how_to_use: Hold the Tilde/Grave key, look at a block, and mine it. The outlines should show what you're about to mine.
mod_credits: [FTB Ultimine](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/ftb-ultimine-fabric) for the inspiration for the mod.
[Architectury API](https://modrinth.com/mod/architectury-api) for the multiloader setup in which the mod is built upon.
[KaupenJoe](https://www.youtube.com/@ModdingByKaupenjoe) for teaching me how to mod.

page.mod_description: A colorful upgradable backpack mod for Fabric and NeoForge.
page.mod_how_to_use:
Craft the backpack and open it by right clicking it or by using the hotkey (default B).

![Recipe for a leather backpack.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamkaf/modresources/refs/heads/main/pages/mochila/recipe1.png)

![Upgrade and coloring recipes.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamkaf/modresources/refs/heads/main/pages/mochila/recipe2.png)

You can view all the recipes with [EMI](https://modrinth.com/mod/emi).
mod_credits: [Architectury API](https://modrinth.com/mod/architectury-api) for the multiloader setup in which the mod is built upon.
[KaupenJoe](https://www.youtube.com/@ModdingByKaupenjoe) for teaching me how to mod.

page.mod_description: A new way to upgrade your gear!
page.mod_extra:
**Dynamic Edge** redefines how you enhance your equipment by introducing **Augments**, unique upgrades earned through gameplay. Each augment reflects how you interact with the world, making your gear feel truly personal.  

### **Augments**  
- **Cake Destroyer** üéÇ: Break cakes to unlock this sweet augment, which occasionally drops sugar.  
- **Oceanic** üåä: Spend time underwater to gain this augment, boosting your swimming speed.  
- **Treehugger** üå≥: Chop down a large number of trees to earn this augment, which occasionally drops extra saplings or apples.  
- **Blazing Edge** üî•: Use a sword or axe while on fire to add fire damage to melee attacks.  
- **Frosty Feet** ‚ùÑÔ∏è: Spend time on snow or ice to prevent slipping and reduce fall damage on snowy surfaces.  
- **Creeperbane** üí•: Survive multiple creeper explosions with a shield to reduce shield damage from explosions.  
- **Glowtouched** ‚ú®: Interact with glow squids to make your tools emit a faint glow, illuminating nearby blocks.  
- **Beekeeper** üêù: Harvest honey safely to slightly boost crop growth when carrying tools with this augment.  
- **Windrunner** üí®: Sprint long distances to increase sprinting speed and reduce hunger drain.  
- **Voidwalker** üåå: Spend time near the void to reduce fall damage and gain a short slow-falling effect.  
- And many MANY more.

With **Dynamic Edge**, your gear evolves alongside your adventures, offering rewards for creativity and exploration.
page.mod_how_to_use: Just play the game, you should notice the augments in your gear naturally.
mod_credits: [Architectury API](https://modrinth.com/mod/architectury-api) for the multiloader setup in which the mod is built upon.
[KaupenJoe](https://www.youtube.com/@ModdingByKaupenjoe) for teaching me how to mod.

page.mod_description: A gear leveling mod for Fabric and NeoForge.
page.mod_extra:
**Bonded** is a gear-focused mod that encourages you to build a deeper connection with your tools and armor as you play.  

- ‚ú® **Level Up Your Gear**: The more you use your tools, weapons, and armor, the stronger they become, gaining bonus stats over time.  
- ü™µ **New Stations**: Enhance and maintain your equipment using the new **Tool Bench** and **Repair Bench** introduced by the mod.  
- üéÆ **Progression Through Play**: No complicated systems‚Äîjust play the game and let your equipment grow alongside you.  

With **Bonded**, every item you craft becomes a companion on your journey.

The leveling and repairing feature will work with any tool and armor mod out of the box. Upgrade paths, however, will require compat mods that I can make at your request, just hmu.
page.mod_how_to_use:
Use an item on the **Repair Bench** to repair it, consuming 1 of the repair material for that item.

Use an item on the **Tool Bench** to upgrade it to the next tier. The item must be level 10 (configurable) and you must have the upgrade material in your inventory.


![Bonded Demo](https://i.imgur.com/bwwnunt.gif)

![Tool Bench recipe](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamkaf/modresources/refs/heads/main/pages/bonded/screenshot1.png)

![Tool Bench recipe](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamkaf/modresources/refs/heads/main/pages/bonded/screenshot2.png)

![Repair Bench recipe](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iamkaf/modresources/refs/heads/main/pages/bonded/screenshot3.png)
page.mod_compatibility: The leveling and repairing feature will work with any tool and armor mod out of the box. Upgrade paths, however, will require compat mods that I can make at your request, just hmu.
mod_credits: [Architectury API](https://modrinth.com/mod/architectury-api) for the multiloader setup in which the mod is built upon.
